faq.q: How do I switch between my LED presets?
faq.a: Press the action button at the top of GlowTower once to switch to the next saved preset. Via WiFi you can change the saved presets.

faq.q: How do I write & upload my own code for GlowTower?
faq.a: We recommend using VScode and the VCcode extension 'PlattformIO', to write your own code in C and upload it to GlowTower. You might also want to check out CircuitPython, if you prefer coding in Python.

faq.q: Why does my computer not recognize GlowTower?
faq.a: Make sure you installed the drivers and try again. If you still have issues, check out the instructions from Espressif, for the ESP32 S3 (which is used in GlowTower).

faq.q: How do I delete all my settings on GlowTower?
faq.a: You can visit install.glowingkitty.com and reinstall GlowOS. This way all settings on GlowTower will be also deleted.
